March 25, 2025 - Allen Stone (born March 13, 1987) is an American soul and R&B singer and musician. Stone was born on March 13, 1987, in Chewelah, Washington, near Spokane. He began his career singing at his father's church. His father was a preacher and his mother was an OB/GYN nurse.
